name: Elite Sniper Action - War Shoo
description:
Elite Sniper Action - War Shooting V2 is about 3d sniper skillful soldier having a duty mission near island famous assassin shooter training zone. You are an elite army sniper and an unsung hero in the war against new terrorism.
Feature:
- Ultra REALISTIC 3D graphics and cool animations
- ADDICTING gameplay
- HUNDREDS of thrilling MISSIONS
- Tons of letal WEAPONS
- EASY and INTUITIVE controls
